author: john.jackson
title: Formulating a Community Defense
description: The industry needs capacity for preventing and mitigating theft and fraud. But, it lacks a coordinated strategy. Fraud threatens adoption.
solution: Assemble experts from within the industry, criminology and policing to detail fraud, evaluate potential solutions,  and develop a strategy.
experience: My colleagues in the Futures Working Group are a mix of police executives a scholars experienced in implementing crime prevention strategy.
